Works great! But I think most people would appreciate a walkthrough how to use toast! 
1: Open toast titanium.
2: Go to utilities (in the menu bar) and press "mount disc image". Then you choose the max payne.DMG. Toast will now create a "fake" disc on your desktop.
3: click the fake disc and run the installation. 

Every time you want to play you have to open toast and mount the dmg first :)
